main.name: Jimmy Wan
main.description: Here will be your description. Use this to describe what you do or whatever you feel best describes yourself to a potential employer
main.bio: I'm a PMP certified former System Analyst with more than 7 years' experience in SDLC. Mainly developed in C#, SQL, JavaScript with ASP.NET framework to provide various web applications and desktop programs to help users eliminate repeating manual works and automate complex tasks. A good project team communicator to drive successful projects. Willing to learn and catch up with the changing technology. Now working as an Analyst Programmer to enhance the functionality of the Azure cloud-based HRMS for expanding his knowledge of technical aspects in SDLC.

resume.skillmessage: Here you can create a short write-up of your skills to show off to employers

education.description: The PMP certification demonstrates to employers, clients and colleagues that a project manager possesses project management knowledge, experience and skills to bring projects to successful completion.

education.degree: BEng (Hons) in e-Logistics and Technology Management
education.description: I studied Java programming in my first year of university life and I found my interest in programming. Then I taught many of my friends about programming during my Student Mentoring Scheme. In the second year - 2014, I was doing my internship job as a programmer trainee at VHSoft Company.

work.title: Analyst Programmer
work.description1: Intragroup transfer from WaiOn Solutions Ltd.

work.description6: Work with programmers as a team and arrange project requirements

work.description2: Provide any other duties as assigned by the supervisors
work.description3: Participate in on-going system support and enhancement

work.description2: Program testing, debug and bug fix

testimonials.text: I have been consistently impressed by both Jimmy's attitude towards his work and his performance on the job. Jimmy is a very responsible person. His strong customer-oriented mind and helpful attitude are well appreciated by the users supported by him.
testimonials.user: Simon Wong - Senior Application Manager at Intertek Testing Services HK Ltd.

testimonials.text: Jimmy Wan is a living example of ''Self-Performance  management to drive operational Xcellence''.
testimonials.user: Andr√© Lacroix - CEO at Intertek Group

testimonials.text: Jimmy showed initiative to learn quickly and was able to complete his assignments on time. I would recommend Jimmy to any potential employer.
testimonials.user: Sunny Ho - Software Development Manager at VHSoft Technologies Co., Ltd.
